name: DailyKindness
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Daily Kindness: Get inspired during your morning briefing from Alexa. This will add a kindness idea each day to your flash briefing.

Ideas are added daily. 

Have an idea for an act of kindness? Email them to us and we will add it to the skill. Email us at info@geekgirlmarketing.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
